column3: I'm so angry with him. I {{c1::could}} kill him!
I {{c1::can}} hear a strange noise. What is it?
I love these biscuits. I {{c1::could}} eat the whole packet.
It's so nice here. I {{c1::could}} sit here all day, but unfortunately I have to go.
I {{c1::can}} understand your point of view, but I don't agree with you.
Peter is a keen musician. He plays the flute and he {{c1::can}} also play the piano.
Some people are unlucky. Life {{c1::can}} be very unfair.
I've been really stupid. I {{c1::could}} kick myself.
